Description: Kulbahira is 57 years old, married and has two children. In search of a source of income for her family, Kulbahira started her own agriculture business in 1993. Thanks to Kulbahira's hard work, today her business contains 2.22 hectares of land, where she grows beans for sale. The profit from the business amounts up to 15,000 som (KGS). In order to continue developing her business, she requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to treat the land and grow ecologically clean crops. Kulbahira plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further developing her business, which will allow her to build a house.
Use: to cultivate her land in order to grow organic crops.
Keywords:
The image depicts a 57-year-old woman, identified by the first name "Kulbahira" and having a husband and two children, who owns an agricultural business in Kyrgyzstan. The business generated 15,000 som KGS annual income but needed a loan of 40,000 som KGS from the Bai-Tushum Bank to improve planting and grow clean crops. The loan was intended to be used to cultivate organic crops on her 2.22 hectares of land in order to improve her business development. 

*  Loan Use Keywords:  cultivating
*  Loan Purpose Keywords: ecologically
*  Target Audience Keywords: Kulbahira, female borrowers
